instructions: Jon October 26, 2014 at 3:59 pm How about songs not purchased through iTunes, but registered via Music Match? Jan F. October 4, 2014 at 8:18 pm open up the iTunes Store on your iPhone click on more and select "Purchased" it should then show you the available content "Music", "Films" click on Music > All Songs, now you should have the "Download All" option on the top right
